title: EP 51: We see you, dads
description: We hear from dads, people talking about their daddies, and we hear about the joys, and challenges, of Black fatherhood. We see you, Black dads. Featuring dads Chris Stewart, Rob Fields, and Sam Adewumi.
itunes:title: We see you, dads
itunes:subtitle: An ode to the dads doing their thing.
author: hangout@thestoop.org (Hana Baba and Leila Day)
itunes:author: Hana Baba and Leila Day
itunes:summary: We hear from dads, people talking about their daddies, and we hear about the joys, and challenges, of Black fatherhood. We see you, Black dads. Featuring dads Chris Stewart, Rob Fields, and Sam Adewumi.
content:encoded: We hear from dads, people talking about their daddies, and we hear about the joys, and challenges, of Black fatherhood. We see you, Black dads. Featuring dads Chris Stewart, Rob Fields, and Sam Adewumi.
